title: What our clients say
subtitle: Discover experiences from our satisfied customers

all.name: Mourad
all.text: I recommend Arnaud for his expertise. He is versatile, responsive, and always ready to propose effective solutions. An excellent collaborator, capable of moving projects forward with complete peace of mind.

all.name: Ronan
all.text: I highly recommend Arnaud for any tech lead position. I had the pleasure of working with Arnaud at Cdiscount, where he demonstrated his exceptional skills in technical leadership.

all.name: Sara
all.text: It is with great pride that I recommend Arnaud Fernandes. I had the opportunity to work with him for nearly 2 years and learned a lot alongside him. Arnaud demonstrated cutting-edge expertise, not only as a Fullstack Developer but also through his managerial logic and the quality of his speaking engagements.
